titles.title: To provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Justice Thurgood Marshall.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1521-1522)
Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H3925)

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 6/16/1993--Introduced. Directs the U.S. Postal Service to issue a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Justice Thurgood Marshall.
